mapper.insert: insert into reservation (r_num, m_id, p_num, c_id, r_content, r_date, r_time, r_name, r_tel) values (r_num, (select m_id from medi where m_name=#{mName}), (select p_num from pet where p_name=#{pName}), #{cId}, #{rContent}, #{rDate}, #{rTime}, #{rName}, #{rTel});
mapper.select: select DISTINCT r_date from reservation where m_id=(select m_id from medi where m_name=#{mName}) order by r_date desc;
select r_time, count(*) from reservation where m_id=(select m_id from medi where m_name=#{mName}) and r_date =#{rDate} group by r_time;
